effect.name: Health Bar Effect v1.1.0
effect.description: An Effect to create complex Health Bars - From ClickStore
effect.author: Uppernate / BartekB, DX11 port by NaitorStudios

parameter.name: Value
parameter.description: The result value of ( value / max_value )

parameter.name: Gradient Image
parameter.description: The Image which is a gradient (white to black OR white to yellow to red to black) that will determine which pixels to remove at certain Values.

parameter.name: Use a Border Image
parameter.description: If ticked, the border image will be drawn ontop of the standard active image.

parameter.name: Border Image
parameter.description: The Image to draw ontop of the Active Image.

parameter.name: Use a Background Image
parameter.description: If ticked, the background image will be drawn on the pixels that disappeared on the standard active image.

parameter.name: Background Image
parameter.description: The Image to draw on the disappeared parts of the active image.

parameter.name: Always draw the background image
parameter.description: If ticked, the background image will always fully draw behind the active image.
